Name: Ten Seconds Trillion
About the game: Ten Seconds Trillion is a simple clicker game with easy goals but addictive gameplay. Your main and only goal is to reach one trillion value. But you have to do it in ten seconds. Click anywhere to get money, buy upgrades to increase your income and use prestige system to activate powerful boosts. It's slow and tough at the beginning but after dozens power ups you will be able to complete the goal. Click upgrades are based on percentage system. High current value means higher upgrade bonus. Benefits: Simple but addictive clicker gameplay Easy goals and no boring infinite playthrough Cute minimalistic graphics Prestige system and various upgrades Nice ambient music Achievements and leaderboard I created Ten Seconds Trillion as a game that I wanted to play by myself. I hope you share this fun with me.
